books.synopsis: Names fun preschool activities using rhyme: stacking blocks, making music, marching, eating lunch, listening to a story, and finger painting. Includes teacher-led activities at the end.

books.synopsis: From an apple to a zebra, young readers work their way through the alphabet learning to associate letters and words with animals, toys, household items and more. Big photographs and bold lettering make for a colorful, approachable book.
